location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Crommelin, William Andrew Price, John Spencer, Charles Waters, Samuel Court, Cecil Bowyear, President and Council at Bombay, to Benjamin Jervis, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter informs of Peter Elwin Wrench's appointment as Agent in the Persian Gulf and that 1% consulage is to be collected on all trade at Bushire.
